scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix broken-access-control install && npm --prefix cryptographic-failures install && npm --prefix security-logging-failures install && npm --prefix injection install && npm --prefix insecure-design install && npm --prefix vulnerable-components install && npm --prefix security-misconfiguration install && npm --prefix software-data-integrity install && npm --prefix server-side-request-forgery install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix broken-access-control start" "npm --prefix cryptographic-failures start" "npm --prefix security-logging-failures start" "npm --prefix injection start" "npm --prefix insecure-design start" "npm --prefix vulnerable-components start" "npm --prefix security-misconfiguration start" "npm --prefix software-data-integrity start" "npm --prefix server-side-request-forgery start"
